name: Mantyke

conditions.value: when Remoraid is also in the party

description: The Kite Pokémon. A friendly Pokémon that captures the subtle flows of seawater using its two antennae.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is doubled in rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from water or water-type attacks. Instead, half of any water damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to burning.
